comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: Pregnancy is truly a group commitment! While women bear the physical and emotional responsibility of raising a little human, fathers-to-be can help by offering emotional as well as practical assistance. It is important for fathers to realize that they play an important role in their partner's journey, even if their contributions are not always as obvious as the mother's.But don't forget that even with all the help in the world, pregnancy can be a difficult experience. Women frequently experience physical and mental changes that might make them feel vulnerable, which is why they need every support they can get from anyone, especially the man who impregnates them, because they are not the ones who impregnate themselves, therefore helping them in in the way they can doesn't really mean that the woman is taking advantage of them rather they should see it as their responsibility.
